name: Project Haze
description:
Project Haze is an arcady racing game built with Unity's HDRP pipeline.  Enjoy using powerups to win the race. 

Xbox Gamepad is supported( some menus will require a mouse ) , use A to use a powerup. On keyboard use shift. Move with WASD. 

Only the Forest Lake track works right now! I'll fix this within the week!

Note: This should be considered a prototype, only 2 tracks are included and it's single player.
